definitions: relating to or resembling a totem or totems

examples.text: the approach to the house and museum is flanked by wide-eyed, totemic figures

definitions: regarded as being symbolic or representative of a particular quality or concept

examples.text: the totemic image of Bogart represents an immutably powerful mystique
each country has honored its totemic political figure
its destruction became totemic of the horrors of the Blitz
